Z

ZkUtils - Class in com.conductor.kafka.zk
This class wraps some of the Kafka interactions with Zookeeper, namely Broker and Partition queries, as well as consumer group offset operations and queries.
ZkUtils(String, String, int, int) - Constructor for class com.conductor.kafka.zk.ZkUtils
Creates a Zookeeper client.
ZkUtils(Configuration) - Constructor for class com.conductor.kafka.zk.ZkUtils
Creates a Zookeeper client based on the settings in Configuration.
